mapper.select: select r.*, c.cname from rerun r left outer join characters c on r.c_id = c.id where 1=1 and c.cname like concat('%',#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and c.delete_flag = false;

WITH rerun_with_gapday AS ( SELECT rerun_start_date, LAG(rerun.rerun_end_date) OVER (PARTITION BY c_id ORDER BY rerun_start_date) AS prev_date, CASE WHEN LAG(rerun.rerun_end_date) OVER (PARTITION BY c_id ORDER BY rerun_start_date) IS NOT NULL THEN rerun_start_date - LAG(rerun.rerun_end_date) OVER (PARTITION BY c_id ORDER BY rerun_start_date) ELSE 0 END AS gap_day FROM rerun ), gapday_total AS ( SELECT * FROM rerun_with_gapday WHERE gap_day <> 0 ), gapday_count AS ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS count_gap FROM gapday_total ) SELECT v.*, g.count_gap FROM rerun_with_gapday v CROSS JOIN gapday_count g;
